original_text: So Moses stretched out his staff over the land of Egypt, and the Lord brought an east wind upon the land all that day and all that night. When it was morning, the east wind had brought the locusts.
korean_text: 모세가 애굽 땅 위에 그 지팡이를 들매 여호와께서 동풍을 일으켜 온 낮과 온 밤에 불게 하시니 아침이 되매 동풍이 메뚜기를 불어 들인지라

sentences.original_text: So Moses stretched out his staff over the land of Egypt
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 모세가 이집트 땅 위로 지팡이를 뻗었고,

sentences.original_text: and the Lord brought an east wind
upon the land all that day and all that night.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 날 밤낮으로 온 땅에 불게 하셨습니다.

sentences.original_text: the east wind had brought the locusts.
